page.title: 02Results of our Survey
page.content:
Out of a total of 73 households in our area, 19 answered our questions.
{How long have you lived here? Less than 5years___4families. Between 5_10years__4families. Between 10_20years_8families. More than 20years__3families.
{How much land do you own? No land_____________5families. Less than 5acres____5families. Between 5_55acres___7families. More than 55acres___2families.
{What animals do you keep? Ducks_3families. Dogs_5families. Hens_4families. Cats_4families. Geese_1family. Goats_1family. Cows_7families. Rabbits_1family. Horses_3families. Sheep_4families. Guinea Fowl_1family.
